description: This sticky and sweet brussels sprouts make a tasty vegetarian fake away side dish.
name: Kung Pao Brussels Sprouts Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Place the brussels sprouts on a baking tray, drizzle with canola oil and toss well to coat. Roast for 25-30 minutes until crisp and caramelised, shaking halfway through.
Whisk the soy sauce, honey, sesame oil, vinegar, sriracha and garlic together in a small saucepan on medium high heat. Bring to the boil, stirring, and cook for 5 minutes until reduced slightly.
Place the caramelised brussels sprouts in a large bowl, pour over the sauce and toss to coat. Serve with chopped cashews and spring onions on top.
